channel.title: 3 Errors, Help pl0x =)

item.title: 3 Errors, Help pl0x =)
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

So here’s my code

public boolean nonWild() { if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525) || (absX >= 3179 && absX <= 3191 && absY >= 3433 && absY <=3448) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Anything wrong there? this is the error im getting

[code].\client.java:7754: illegal start of expression
if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525
) || (absX >= 3179 && absX <= 3191 && absY >= 3433 && absY <=3448) {

^
.\client.java:7754: ‘;’ expected
if (absX >= 3083 && absX <= 3088 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3525
) || (absX >= 3179 && absX <= 3191 && absY >= 3433 && absY <=3448) {

                                                              ^

.\client.java:7756: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Different problem from last time =p

Read full topic
